bead.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: one of a set of small, usually round, pieces of glass, wood, plastic etc, that you can put on a string and wear as jewellery
bead.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She wore a string of green glass beads around her neck.
bead.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a small drop of liquid such as water or blood
bead.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Beads of sweat trickled down his face.
